title: [Economics] Social distancing laws cause only small losses of economic activity during the COVID-19 pandemic in Scandinavia. This suggests that the virus itself is responsible for the majority of the economic damage. Social distancing laws may actually provide an economic benefit, find new study (3 Aug 2020).
[Health] Over 50% of babies born to COVID-19 infected mothers in Wuhan, China (n=29) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 infection or showed radiographic signs of pneumonia
